code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:white M retired aged 69 ys presents with moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests and moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. he is having symptoms 11 x week, in spite of treatment. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 62.3 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 118, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

s:white male aged 71 years presents with increased moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests and moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances over 5 months. o:Height 162 cm, Weight 59.7 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.
